title: First Known Covid Case Was Vendor at Wuhan Market, Scientist Claims
content:
1. First Known Covid Case Was Vendor at Wuhan Market, Scientist Claims  The New York Times
  2. Fresh look at pandemic origins points straight to food market in Wuhan, scientist says  CNN
  3. New Reconstruction Points to Animal Origins for Covid-19  The Wall Street Journal
  4. COVID-19’s first known case was a vendor from Wuhan wet market, Arizona scientist says, disputing WHO report  Fox News
  5. Earliest COVID cases point to live-animal market as most likely source  Los Angeles Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: Covidの最初の症例は武漢市場のベンダーだったと科学者が主張
科学家称首个已知的Covid病例是武汉市场上的供应商
科學家稱首個已知的Covid病例是武漢市場上的供應商
